divs: Sighting DetailsWas in my den on the Eastern side of my house and I was looking out my windows towards the South and saw an oval object that was hovering and going around in circles. At the same time I was hearing a loud humming sound and I passed out on the couch. I heard this sound twice. This sound did not last long. On investigation myself I went out about a week later and found about 50 feet from my house an oval marking on the ground that was cinged...this was about 30 feet wide. I felt very afraid...there were dogs barking... Tuesday of the next week I saw a object outside circling. I was in my den again and went to draw the curtain on the windows and notice a tall shrub with strange looking burning red lights...
Summary: Was in my den on the Eastern side of my house and I was looking out my windows towards the South and saw an oval object that was hovering and going around in circles.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Danville
This sighting has never been favorited.
